content.title: Update Network Zone in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Updates properties of an existing network zone in a specified scope such as 'vsys'. This may include modifying user identification settings or changing interface membership. The '@name' in the body must match the 'name' query parameter unless a rename is being performed separately.

required_query_parameters.location: Defines the configuration scope, such as 'vsys' or 'shared'.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required when location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: Specifies the zone being updated and should match @name inside the entry unless intentionally changed.

common_errors: 400: Missing or invalid query parameters (location, vsys, or name)
404: Zone not found in the specified scope
409: Invalid interface reference or conflicting configuration
